movies.name: Underdog
movies.Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
movies.Actors: Jason Lee, Peter Dinklage, Jim Belushi, Patrick Warburton
movies.Plot: A Beagle must use his newly-bestowed superpowers to defend Capitol City from mad scientist Simon Barsinister.

movies.name: Honest Thief
movies.Actors: Liam Neeson, Kate Walsh, Jai Courtney, Jeffrey Donovan
movies.Plot: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

movies.name: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
movies.Actors: Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Hayden Christensen, Ian McDiarmid
movies.Plot: Three years into the Clone Wars, the Jedi rescue Palpatine from Count Dooku. As Obi-Wan pursues a new threat, Anakin acts as a double agent between the Jedi Council and Palpatine and is lured into a sinister plan to rule the galaxy.

movies.name: Deadpool
movies.Actors: Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer
movies.Plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

movies.name: Bruce Almighty
movies.Actors: Jim Carrey, Morgan Freeman, Jennifer Aniston, Philip Baker Hall
movies.Plot: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

movies.name: Bad Boys for Life
movies.Actors: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens, Alexander Ludwig
movies.Plot: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

movies.name: Sausage Party
movies.Actors: Alistair Abell, Iris Apatow, Sugar Lyn Beard, Michael Cera
movies.Plot: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

movies.name: A Dog's Purpose
movies.Actors: Josh Gad, Dennis Quaid, Peggy Lipton, Bryce Gheisar
movies.Plot: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

movies.name: Apollo 11
movies.Actors: Neil Armstrong, Michael Collins, Buzz Aldrin, Deke Slayton
movies.Plot: A look at the Apollo 11 mission to land on the moon led by commander Neil Armstrong and pilots Buzz Aldrin and Michael Collins.

movies.name: Kiss the Ground
movies.Actors: Woody Harrelson, Ray Archuleta, John Wick, Kristin Ohlson
movies.Plot: A revolutionary group of activists, scientists, farmers, and politicians band together in a global movement of "Regenerative Agriculture" that could balance our climate, replenish our vast water supplies, and feed the world

movies.name: The Game Changers
movies.Actors: James Wilks, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Patrik Baboumian, Dotsie Bausch
movies.Plot: A UFC fighter's world is turned upside down when he discovers an elite group of world-renowned athletes and scientists who prove that everything he had been taught about protein was a lie.

movies.name: American Factory
movies.Actors: Junming 'Jimmy' Wang, Robert Allen, Sherrod Brown, Dave Burrows
movies.Plot: In post-industrial Ohio, a Chinese billionaire opens a factory in an abandoned General Motors plant, hiring two thousand Americans. Early days of hope and optimism give way to setbacks as high-tech China clashes with working-class America.

movies.name: The Blue Lagoon
movies.Actors: Brooke Shields, Christopher Atkins, Leo McKern, William Daniels
movies.Plot: In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.

movies.name: Gone Girl
movies.Actors: Ben Affleck, Rosamund Pike, Neil Patrick Harris, Tyler Perry
movies.Plot: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

movies.name: The Revenant
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Domhnall Gleeson, Will Poulter
movies.Plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

movies.name: After
movies.Actors: Josephine Langford, Hero Fiennes Tiffin, Khadijha Red Thunder, Dylan Arnold
movies.Plot: A young woman falls for a guy with a dark secret and the two embark on a rocky relationship. Based on the novel by Anna Todd.

movies.name: Mary
movies.Actors: Gary Oldman, Emily Mortimer, Manuel Garcia-Rulfo, Stefanie Scott
movies.Plot: A family looking to start a charter-boat business buys a ship that holds terrifying secrets once out on isolated waters.

movies.name: The Grudge
movies.Actors: Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, William Mapother, Clea DuVall
movies.Plot: An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.

movies.name: Gretel & Hansel
movies.Actors: Sophia Lillis, Samuel Leakey, Alice Krige, Jessica De Gouw
movies.Plot: A long time ago in a distant fairy tale countryside, a young girl leads her little brother into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

movies.name: The Nun
movies.Actors: Demi√°n Bichir, Taissa Farmiga, Jonas Bloquet, Bonnie Aarons
movies.Plot: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

movies.name: 100% Wolf
movies.Actors: Loren Gray, Adriane Daff, Jane Lynch, Jai Courtney
movies.Plot: 100% Wolf centers on Freddy Lupin, heir to a proud family line of werewolves. Positive he'll become the most fearsome werewolf ever, Freddy is in for a shock when his first "warfing" goes awry, turning him into a ferocious - poodle.

movies.name: Woody Woodpecker
movies.Actors: Eric Bauza, Timothy Omundson, Graham Verchere, Jordana Largy
movies.Plot: The hyperactive red-headed bird enters a turf war with a big city lawyer wanting to tear down his home in an effort to build a house to flip.

movies.name: Ferdinand
movies.Actors: Jack Gore, Jet Jurgensmeyer, Nile Diaz, Colin H. Murphy
movies.Plot: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

movies.name: Pets United
movies.Actors: Patrick Roche, Natalie Dormer, Felix Auer, Jeff Burrell
movies.Plot: A group of spoilt, selfish pets led by glamour cat Belle are stranded in their luxury hangout 'Pampered Pets,' when the machines that run Robo City, the hypermodern metropolis that they live in, go wild and take over.
